SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Use Metric Units
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: If true, you'll see kilos, meters, kilometers instead of lbs, feet, and miles

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Enable Halfway Cue
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: When true, the app will notify you when you've reached halfway in your run. Note it cannot always determine what 'halfway' is depending on the segments you provide for the run

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Estimate Calories
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Whether or not to provide a calorie burn estimate - based on height, weight, and age.
